itunes:title: Hair School Horror Stories
title: Hair School Horror Stories
description: We've spilled the beans on all y'all's horror stories in the salon and we thought it was high time to (and holiday-appropriate) do an episode highlighting your hair school horror stories! From men who get close to a happy ending to the one time a client pooped in the chair, we're sharing all of your's (and our) most awful stories. We hope you enjoy this Halloween episode!
content:encoded: We've spilled the beans on all y'all's horror stories in the salon and we thought it was high time to (and holiday-appropriate) do an episode highlighting your hair school horror stories!
